nodes.bodyText: No alternative for parsing json than jackson lib ? (as it is known to have CVE issues)

nodes.bodyText: Scope creep : issue is about BigQuery upgrade? And this Jackson lib is a dependency pulled by Google Big Query, I cannot change it.
nodes.diffHunk:
